metadata.name: Diskshadow Script Mode - Uncommon Script Extension Execution
metadata.comment: Detects execution of "Diskshadow.exe" in script mode to execute an script with a potentially uncommon extension. Initial baselining of the allowed extension list is required.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('diskshadow.exe') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\diskshadow.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-s ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/s ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('–s ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('—s ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('―s '))) AND NOT contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.txt')))

output.summary: Detects execution of "Diskshadow.exe" in script mode to execute an script with a potentially uncommon extension. Initial baselining of the allowed extension list is required.

metadata.objective: False positive: False postitve might occur with legitimate or uncommon extensions used internally. Initial baseline is required.
